prodNameC: "維特司"皮質醇免疫檢測試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
Reagent pack：
．100 coated wells (streptavidin, binds≧3 ng biotin/well).
．9.1 mL conjugate reagent (HRP-cortisol, ≧100 ng/mL) in buffer with human plasma and antimicrobial agent.
．9.1 mL biotinylated antibody reagent (biotin-sheep anti-cortisol, binds≧0.719 nmol cortisol/mL) in buffer with antimicrobial agent.
Calibrator Pack：
．3 sets of cortisol calibrators 1,2 and 3 (freeze-dried cortisol in human plasma with antimicrobial agent, reconstitution volume 1 mL)；nominal values 0, 125 ,750 nmol cortisol/L.
Control Pack：
．3 set of controls 1,2 and 3 (freeze-dried human plasma with antimicrobial agent), reconstitution volume 1 mL.
applicantName: 台灣大昌華嘉股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市內湖區堤頂大道二段407巷20弄1、3、5、7號10樓及22、24、26號10樓及22號10樓之1
efficacy: 定量檢測人類血清, 血漿(Heparin或EDTA)及尿液中皮質醇。
mdFormat: Reagent Packs: 100 well/boxCalibrators: 3x3 levels (reconstitution volume 1 mL)Metabolism Control: 3 levelsx 3 sets

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學用裝置
